name: Parking-Driving Test
description:
Whether you are a driving learner, or a car driver, or you want to improve parking skills, I believe you will deeply love this game.

The game simulates a variety of classic and practical parking zone, the picture is clear and concise, and each level has been carefully designed.
You will find the control feeling is very realistic, and it is easy to play: parking the car into the target position.
You will learn the real parking skill and driving knowledge in the game.

The best software for car drivers and driving learner, I wish you success!!
